channel.title: SoftLayer_Brand_Restriction_Location_CustomerCountry on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Brand_Restriction_Location_CustomerCountry on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Brand_Restriction_Location_CustomerCountry
item.description: SoftLayer_Brand_Restriction_Location_CustomerCountry Service Datatype Description The [[SoftLayer_Brand_Restriction_Location_CustomerCountry]] data type defines the relationship between brands, locations and countries associated with a user’s account that are ineligible when ordering products. For example, the India datacenter may not be available on the SoftLayer US brand for customers that live in Great Britain. Local brandId The brand associated with customer's account. Type: integer customerCountryCode country code associated with customer's account.
